SourceProxy.name: ProgrammableFilter
SourceProxy.label: Programmable Filter

Documentation.long_help: Executes a user supplied python script on its input dataset to produce an output dataset.
Documentation.short_help: Executes a python script to produce data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter will execute a python script to produce an output dataset. The filter keeps a copy of the python script in Script, and creates Interpretor, a python interpretor to run the script upon the first execution.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input(s) to the programmable filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable filter runs.

StringVectorProperty.name: InformationScript
StringVectorProperty.label: Script (RequestInformation)
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property is a python script that is executed during the RequestInformation pipeline pass. Use this to provide information such as WHOLE_EXTENT to the pipeline downstream.

StringVectorProperty.name: PythonPath
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: A semi-colon (;) separated list of directories to add to the python library search path.
